title: Download and Install Julia
text:
To install Julia, go to this URL and follow instructions: https://julialang.org/downloads/
That website will likely detect your operating system and suggest the right approach.
On a Mac, you simply open a Terminal window (look for the Terminal application in your Applications/Utilities directory) and type the command below at the Terminal prompt:
curl -fsSL https://install.julialang.org | sh
The above command installs the Juliaup installation manager, which is a wonderful tool to help update Julia and keep different versions (if you wish) available on your computer.
